code.explanation: A non-mutable value was assigned a value./n/nErroneous code example:/n/n```compile_fail,E0594/nstruct SolarSystem {/n    earth: i32,/n}/n/nlet ss = SolarSystem { earth: 3 };/nss.earth = 2; // error!/n```/n/nTo fix this error, declare `ss` as mutable by using the `mut` keyword:/n/n```/nstruct SolarSystem {/n    earth: i32,/n}/n/nlet mut ss = SolarSystem { earth: 3 }; // declaring `ss` as mutable/nss.earth = 2; // ok!/n```/n
